text: Leofan men, understandað þæt ærest cristenra manna gehwylc ah ealra þinga mæste ðearfe þæt he cunne Godes riht ongytan þurh lare & lage & gelyfan anrædlice on God ælmihtigne, þe is waldend & wyrhta ealra gesceafta.
And syððan is eac þearf þæt gehwa understande hwanan he sylf com, & hwæt he is, & to hwan he geweorðan sceal.
Of eorðan gewurdan ærest geworhte þa ðe we ealle of coman, & to eorðan we sculan ealle geweorðan & syððan habban swa ece wite a butan ende, swa ece blisse, swa hwæðer swa we on life ær geearnedon.
Eala, lytel is se fyrst þyses lifes, & lyðre is, þæt we lufiað & on wuniað, & for oft hit wyrð raðost forloren þonne hit wære leofost gehealden.
Ac utan don swa us mycel þearf is, tylian þæs ðe us næfre ne ateorað, lufian Godd eallum mode & eallum mægne & wyrcan georne his willan.
His wylla is þæt we aa æfter ure agenre þearfe geornlice winnan & þæt geearnian þæt we to gelaðode syn, þæt is heofona rice ðæt he hæfð gegearwod ælcum þæra þe his willan gewyrcð her on worulde.

Utan don eac swa we þearfe agan, beon mildheorte & ælmesgeorne & eadmode & soðfæste & unswicole & rihtwise þæs þe we magan on eallum ðingum, & geðencan hwæt we behetan þa we fulluht underfengan, oðþon þa ðe æt fulluhte ure foresprecan wæran.
Þæt is, þæt we woldan a God lufian & on hine gelyfan & his bebodu healdan & deofol ascunian & his unlara georne forbugan.
Þis man behæt for ælcne þæra þe fulluht underfehð; & ðeah þæt cild for geogoðe sprecan ne mage þonne hit man fullað, his freonda forespræc forstent him eal þæt ylce þe hit sylf spræce.
Is þeah ma manna þonne þearf wære þe þises behates gescad ne cunnan.
Twa word behealdað mycel:Abrenuntio&credo.
Leofan men, for ure ealra þearfe Crist com on þis lif & for ure neode deað þrowode.
Ær ðam timan næs ænig man on worulde swa mære þæt he on an ne sceolde to helle, swa he heonan ferde, swa forð ahte deofol geweald ealles manncynnes eal for ure yldrena gewyrhtan.
Ac mycel geþolode ðurh his mildheortnesse Crist for ure þearfe þa he let hine sylfne bindan & swingan & on rode ahon & him ægðer þurhdrifan mid isenum næglum ge fet ge handa & swa to deaðe acwellan.
Ac he geswutelode swaðeah þy ðriddan dæge þa he of deaðe aras þæt he ægðres geweald hæfð ge lifes ge deaþes.
Leofan men, hwa mæg æfre oðrum furðor freondscype gecyðan þonne he his agen feorh gesylle & ðurh þæt his freond wið deað ahredde?
Ealle, we scoldan forweorðan ecan deaðe, nære þæt Crist for us deað þrowode.
Ac he gebohte us þa ealle mid his deorwurðan blode of helle wite & hæfð nu þurh his gyfe manna gehwylc, gif he geearnian wylle, heofona rice.

Ðonne ne þince us næfre to mycel, ac us mæg aa to lytel, þæt we Godes þances to Gode gedon, forðam ne cunne we næfre him geleanian þa ðing ealle þe he us gedon hæfð & dæghwamlice deð & gyt don wile, þær we betst beðurfan, gyf we sylfe þæs geearnian wyllað.
Leofan men, utan don swa us þearf is, beon geornfulle ure agenre þearfe, geswican ure synna, & forbugan ælc unriht & gebugan georne to rihte.
And utan understandan þæt nis nan rihtra dom þonne ure ælc oðrum beode þæt we willan þæt man us beode.
And utan geþencan þæt we habbað ænne heofonlicne fæder & þæt we syndan þurh cristendom ealle gebroðra.

Ðy ne misbeode cristenra manna ænig oðrum ealles to swyðe, forðam eal þæt ænig man oðrum her on unriht to hearme gedeð wordes oððon weorces, eal hit sceal eft mænigfealdlice derian him sylfum, butan he hit ær gebete.
Ac utan gladian georne God ælmihtine, habban us soðe sibbe & some gemæne & don a to gode þæne dæl þe we magan & geearnian us mid þam ece blisse.

Utan gyman þæt we urne cristendom clænlice gehealdan & aweorpan alcne hæðendom & habban rihtne geleafan, & lufian cyricsocne dæges & nihtes oft & gelome, & libban þam life þe scrift us wisige, & a að & wedd wærlice healdan, & freolstida & fæstentida rihtlice understandan, & ure ælmessan geornlice dælan & gelæstan bliðum mode Gode þa gerihta þe him to gebyrian, þæt is se teoða dæl ealra þæra ðinga þe he us on ðysum lænan life to forlæten hæfð, & ure frumgripan gangendes & weaxendes, & geearnian us mid þam lytlum mycle mare us sylfum to þearfe.
Ðonne is þærtoeacan gyt to understandenne þæt we eac eadmodlice eal gelæstan on geargerihtan þæt ure yldran hwilum ær Gode behetan; ðæt is sulhælmessan & rompenegas & cyricsceattas & leohtgescota.
& se ðe þæt deð þæt ic ymbe spece, he deð him sylfum mycle ðearfe.

And þæt is witodlice ful soð, gelyfe se ðe wylle, an tima cymð ure æghwylcum þæt us wære leofre þonne eal þæt we on worulde wiðæftan us læfað, þær we a worhton, þa hwile þe we mihtan, georne þæt God licode.
Ac þænne we sculan habban anfeald lean þæs þe we on life ær geworhton.
Wa ðam þonne þe ær geearnode helle wite.
Ðær is ece bryne grimme gemencged, & ðær is ece gryre; ðær is ece æce, & ðær is sorgung & sargung, & a singal heof; þær is wanung & granung; ðær is yrmða gehwylc & ealra deofla geðring.
Wa ðam þe þær sceal wunian on wite.
Betere him wære þæt he man nære æfre geworden þonne he gewurde.
Nis se man on life þe areccan mæge ealle þa yrmða þe se gebidan sceal se ðe on ða witu ealles behreoseð; & hit is ealles þe wyrse þe his ænig ende ne cymð æfre to worulde.

Ðyder sculan manslagan, & ðider sculan mansworan; þyder sculan æwbrecan & ða fulan forlegenan; ðider sculan wiccan & bearnmyrðran; ðider sculan þeofas & ðeodscaðan, ryperas & reaferas, &, hrædest to secganne, ealle þa manfullan þe God gremiað, butan hy geswican & ðe deoppor gebetan.
For Godes lufan we biddað manna gehwylcne þæt he beþence georne hine sylfne.
Utan gecyrran georne fram synnum & God biddan inweardre heortan þæt he us gebeorge wið þone egsan.
Utan forfleon geornlice man & morðor & manslihtas, stala & strudunga & searacræftas, & utan scyldan wið forliger & wið æghwylce fylðe, & utan lufian riht georne & ælc unriht ascunian.
Utan andettan ure synna urum scriftan þa hwile þe we magan & motan, & betan & a geswican & don to gode swa mycel swa we mæst magan.
Þonne beorge we us sylfum wið ece wite, & geearniað us heofona rice.
